abstract: The name of a share record that manages a shared record zone.
overview:
## Discussion

When you create an instance of [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKShare] for sharing a record zone, CloudKit automatically assigns this constant as the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKRecord/ID/recordName] element of the share record’s [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKRecord/recordID]. After you save the share record to iCloud, you can fetch it by reconstructing the record ID using this constant, as the following example shows:

items.description: Creates a new record ID with the specified name in the default zone.
items.name: init(recordName:)

items.description: Creates a new record ID with the specified name and zone information.
items.name: init(recordName:zoneID:)
